title: Cowboys-Patriots, Lakers, Clippers, NCAAFB, & Antonio Brown
itunes:title: Cowboys-Patriots, Lakers, Clippers, NCAAFB, & Antonio Brown
description:
Colin discusses how the Lakers are out shinning the Clippers, why Cowboys HC Jason Garrett might be coaching for his job against the Patriots, why he thinks the College Football playoff committee is pushing for two SEC teams, and why he feels the Patriots might take another look at WR Antonio Brown. Guests include Nick Wright, Joel Klatt, David West, Bucky Brooks, and CM Punk.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
